description: From Neapolitan guappo (“dude, stud”), a greeting borrowed from Spanish guapo (“bold, handsome”).

entries.meaning: (UK, US, slang, derogatory, ethnic slur) A person of Italian descent.

verbs.description: wop (third-person singular simple present wops, present participle wopping, simple past and past participle wopped)

entries.meaning: Alternative form of whop (“to hit or strike”)
